content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I understand you need electrical work done. May I get your name to start the scheduling process?
Thanks, Susan! Could you please provide your address so I can confirm our service availability?
Great, Susan. You are within our service area. When would be a good time for our electrician to come by?
I need to check with my husband first before setting a date. I can't schedule anything right now.
reason: Customer needs spouse approval before scheduling

content: No problem at all, Susan. Please feel free to reach out whenever you're ready. We're here to help. Have a wonderful day!
reason: Customer needs spouse approval before scheduling
